com.amazon.device.iap

Class PurchasingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.device.iap.PurchasingService

  • public final class PurchasingService
extends java.lang.Object
    Presents the primary API for interacting with the Amazon Appstore purchasing framework. First register a PurchasingListener instance via registerListener(Context, PurchasingListener) before using any other API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean IS_SANDBOX_MODE
      If true, the SDK is running in Sandbox mode, which only allows interactions with the Amazon AppTester.
      static java.lang.String SDK_VERSION
      Indicates the release version of the API for making in-app purchases.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RequestId getProductData(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> skus)
      Initiates a request to retrieve item data of up to one-hundred SKUs.
      static RequestId getPurchaseUpdates(boolean reset)
      Initiates a request to retrieve updates about items the customer has purchased and/or canceled.
      static RequestId getUserData()
      Initiates a request to retrieve the user ID of the currently logged-in user.

      Notifies Amazon about the purchase fulfillment.
      static RequestId purchase(java.lang.String sku)
      Initiates a purchase-flow for a product.
      static void registerListener(android.content.Context appContext, PurchasingListener listener)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • SDK_VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String SDK_VERSION
        Indicates the release version of the API for making in-app purchases.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IS_SANDBOX_MODE

        public static final boolean IS_SANDBOX_MODE
        If true, the SDK is running in Sandbox mode, which only allows interactions with the Amazon AppTester. Use this mode only for testing locally. Otherwise, the SDK is running in production mode, which allows interaction between the Amazon Appstore and actual customer accounts.

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        public static void registerListener(android.content.Context appContext,
                    PurchasingListener listener)
        Before invoking operations in this class, register a PurchasingListener and its Context. After registering your PurchasingListener implementation, you can receive callbacks from the in-app purchasing SDK after you invoke operations on PurchasingService.
        Parameters:
        listener - PurchasingListener to register.
        appContext - application context.

      • getUserData

        public static RequestId getUserData()
        Initiates a request to retrieve the user ID of the currently logged-in user. PurchasingListener.onUserDataResponse(com.amazon.device.iap.model.UserDataResponse) gets called when a response is available.

      • purchase

        public static RequestId purchase(java.lang.String sku)
        Initiates a purchase-flow for a product. When the purchase-flow completes, PurchasingEventListener#onPurchaseResponse(PurchaseResponse) gets called.
        Parameters:
        sku - Vendor SKU for which to initiate a purchase.
        Returns:
        Request ID to use to associate this request with the PurchaseResponse received by the PurchasingListener.onPurchaseResponse(PurchaseResponse) callback.

      • getProductData

        public static RequestId getProductData(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> skus)
        Initiates a request to retrieve item data of up to one-hundred SKUs. When a response is available PurchasingListener.onProductDataResponse(com.amazon.device.iap.model.ProductDataResponse) gets called.
        Parameters:
        skus - Set of SKUs. If the size of the set is greater than 100, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Returns:
        Request ID for which to associate this request with the ProductDataResponse received by the PurchasingListener.onProductDataResponse(com.amazon.device.iap.model.ProductDataResponse) callback.

      • getPurchaseUpdates

        public static RequestId getPurchaseUpdates(boolean reset)
        Initiates a request to retrieve updates about items the customer has purchased and/or canceled. When a response is available, PurchasingListener.onPurchaseUpdatesResponse(com.amazon.device.iap.model.PurchaseUpdatesResponse) (PurchaseUpdatesResponse) gets called.
        Parameters:
        reset - Set to true to get a list of all purchases. Set to false to get a list of all purchases made since the last invocation.
        Returns:
        Request ID for which to associate this request with the PurchaseUpdatesResponse received by the PurchasingListener.onPurchaseUpdatesResponse(com.amazon.device.iap.model.PurchaseUpdatesResponse) callback.

      • notifyFulfillment

        public static void notifyFulfillment(java.lang.String receiptId,
                     FulfillmentResult fulfillmentResult)
        Notifies Amazon about the purchase fulfillment. There is no callback for this API.
        Parameters:
        receiptId - Receipt ID of the purchase.
        fulfillmentResult - Result of the fulfillment.
